definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the management and allocation of monetary resources within an organization or institution, encompassing activities related to budgeting, investing, and financial planning. It is frequently utilized in the context of business, economics, and personal finance.

examples.german: Die Finanzierung des Projekts wurde genehmigt.
examples.english: The financing of the project was approved.
He works in the finance sector.

examples.german: Die Finanzkrise hat zu vielen Entlassungen geführt.
examples.english: The financial crisis has led to many layoffs.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Karriere in der Finanzwelt angestrebt.
examples.english: She has pursued a career in the financial world.

examples.german: Die Finanzabteilung ist für die Buchhaltung zuständig.
examples.english: The finance department is responsible for accounting.
